title: Counter
code:
§begin count_items
  items ← [1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7]
  count ← 0
  §iterate item §in items
    count ← count ⊕ 1
  §end_iterate
  §transmit count
§end
solution_description: counts the number of elements in an array
hints: count increases by 1 for each item
The loop runs once per array element
This counts how many items exist
